abstract: Former Buffalo Bills coach Doug Marrone is being considered by New York Jets as their new coach.
lead_paragraph: The team plans to speak next week with Marrone, who opted out as coach of the Buffalo Bills on Wednesday, but no interview has been scheduled yet, said a person with knowledge of the team’s thinking.
snippet: The team plans to speak next week with Marrone, who opted out as coach of the Buffalo Bills on Wednesday, but no interview has been scheduled yet, said a person with knowledge of the team’s thinking.

headline.main: Doug Marrone Is Among Jets’ Candidates
headline.print_headline: Marrone, Ex-Bills Coach, Is Among Seven Candidates for Jets
